name: @thirdstrandstudio/mcp-figma
description: Interact seamlessly with the Figma API to manage files, comments, components, and more. Leverage a comprehensive set of tools to enhance your design workflow and automate tasks within Figma. Simplify your design processes and integrate Figma capabilities into your applications effortlessly.

tools.name: figma_get_me
tools.description: Get the current user

tools.name: figma_get_file
tools.description: Get a Figma file by key

ids.description: Comma separated list of nodes that you care about in the document

depth.description: Positive integer representing how deep into the document tree to traverse

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

version.description: A specific version ID to get

geometry.description: Set to "paths" to export vector data

branch_data.description: Returns branch metadata for the requested file

plugin_data.description: A comma separated list of plugin IDs and/or the string "shared"

tools.name: figma_get_file_nodes
tools.description: Get specific nodes from a Figma file

ids.description: A comma separated list of node IDs to retrieve and convert

depth.description: Positive integer representing how deep into the node tree to traverse

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

version.description: A specific version ID to get

geometry.description: Set to "paths" to export vector data

plugin_data.description: A comma separated list of plugin IDs and/or the string "shared"

tools.name: figma_get_images
tools.description: Render images from a Figma file

ids.description: A comma separated list of node IDs to render

scale.description: A number between 0.01 and 4, the image scaling factor

format.description: A string enum for the image output format

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

version.description: A specific version ID to get

contents_only.description: Whether content that overlaps the node should be excluded from rendering

svg_include_id.description: Whether to include id attributes for all SVG elements

svg_outline_text.description: Whether text elements are rendered as outlines (vector paths) or as <text> elements in SVGs

svg_include_node_id.description: Whether to include node id attributes for all SVG elements

svg_simplify_stroke.description: Whether to simplify inside/outside strokes and use stroke attribute if possible

use_absolute_bounds.description: Use the full dimensions of the node regardless of whether or not it is cropped

tools.name: figma_get_image_fills
tools.description: Get image fills in a Figma file

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

tools.name: figma_get_file_versions
tools.description: Get version history of a Figma file

after.description: A version ID for one of the versions in the history. Gets versions after this ID

before.description: A version ID for one of the versions in the history. Gets versions before this ID

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

page_size.description: The number of items returned in a page of the response

tools.name: figma_get_comments
tools.description: Get comments in a Figma file

as_md.description: Whether to return the comments as markdown

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

tools.name: figma_post_comment
tools.description: Add a comment to a Figma file

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

message.description: The text contents of the comment to post

comment_id.description: The ID of the comment to reply to, if any

client_meta.description: The position where to place the comment

tools.name: figma_delete_comment
tools.description: Delete a comment from a Figma file

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

commentId.description: The ID of the comment to delete

tools.name: figma_get_comment_reactions
tools.description: Get reactions for a comment

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

commentId.description: The ID of the comment to get reactions for

tools.name: figma_post_comment_reaction
tools.description: Add a reaction to a comment

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

commentId.description: The ID of the comment to add a reaction to

tools.name: figma_delete_comment_reaction
tools.description: Delete a reaction from a comment

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

commentId.description: The ID of the comment to delete a reaction from

tools.name: figma_get_team_projects
tools.description: Get projects in a team

teamId.description: The ID of the team to get projects for

tools.name: figma_get_project_files
tools.description: Get files in a project

projectId.description: The ID of the project to get files for

branch_data.description: Returns branch metadata in the response

tools.name: figma_get_team_components
tools.description: Get components in a team

after.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving components for

before.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving components for

teamId.description: The ID of the team to get components for

page_size.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results

tools.name: figma_get_file_components
tools.description: Get components in a file

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

tools.name: figma_get_component
tools.description: Get a component by key

key.description: The key of the component to get

tools.name: figma_get_team_component_sets
tools.description: Get component sets in a team

after.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving component sets for

before.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving component sets for

teamId.description: The ID of the team to get component sets for

page_size.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results

tools.name: figma_get_file_component_sets
tools.description: Get component sets in a file

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

tools.name: figma_get_component_set
tools.description: Get a component set by key

key.description: The key of the component set to get

tools.name: figma_get_team_styles
tools.description: Get styles in a team

after.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving styles for

before.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving styles for

teamId.description: The ID of the team to get styles for

page_size.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results

tools.name: figma_get_file_styles
tools.description: Get styles in a file

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

tools.name: figma_get_style
tools.description: Get a style by key

key.description: The key of the style to get

tools.name: figma_post_webhook
tools.description: Create a webhook

status.description: State of the webhook, including any error state it may be in

team_id.description: Team id to receive updates about

endpoint.description: The HTTP endpoint that will receive a POST request when the event triggers

passcode.description: String that will be passed back to your webhook endpoint to verify that it is being called by Figma

event_type.description: An enum representing the possible events that a webhook can subscribe to

description.description: User provided description or name for the webhook

tools.name: figma_get_webhook
tools.description: Get a webhook by ID

webhook_id.description: The ID of the webhook to get

tools.name: figma_update_webhook
tools.description: Update a webhook

status.description: State of the webhook, including any error state it may be in

endpoint.description: The HTTP endpoint that will receive a POST request when the event triggers

passcode.description: String that will be passed back to your webhook endpoint to verify that it is being called by Figma

webhook_id.description: The ID of the webhook to update

description.description: User provided description or name for the webhook

tools.name: figma_delete_webhook
tools.description: Delete a webhook

webhook_id.description: The ID of the webhook to delete

tools.name: figma_get_team_webhooks
tools.description: Get webhooks for a team

team_id.description: The ID of the team to get webhooks for

tools.name: figma_get_library_analytics_component_usages
tools.description: Get library analytics component usage data

cursor.description: Cursor indicating what page of data to fetch

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

group_by.description: A dimension to group returned analytics data by

tools.name: figma_get_library_analytics_style_usages
tools.description: Get library analytics style usage data

cursor.description: Cursor indicating what page of data to fetch

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

group_by.description: A dimension to group returned analytics data by

tools.name: figma_get_library_analytics_variable_usages
tools.description: Get library analytics variable usage data

cursor.description: Cursor indicating what page of data to fetch

fileKey.description: The file key to use for the operation

group_by.description: A dimension to group returned analytics data by
